name: Slack Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Slack Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Slack events via webhooks

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken

notice.displayName: This will use one execution for every event in any channel your bot is in, use with caution
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This will use one execution for every event in any channel your bot is in, use with caution

trigger.name: trigger
trigger.natural_language_description: 参数名: Trigger On | 默认值: []
available_options: Any Event (值: any_event) - Triggers on any event
Bot / App Mention (值: app_mention) - When your bot or app is mentioned in a channel the app is added to
File Made Public (值: file_public) - When a file is made public
File Shared (值: file_share) - When a file is shared in a channel the app is added to
New Message Posted to Channel (值: message) - When a message is posted to a channel the app is added to
New Public Channel Created (值: channel_created) - When a new public channel is created
New User (值: team_join) - When a new user is added to Slack
Reaction Added (值: reaction_added) - When a reaction is added to a message the app is added to

watchWorkspace.name: watchWorkspace
watchWorkspace.description: Whether to watch for the event in the whole workspace, rather than a specific channel
watchWorkspace.natural_language_description: 参数名: Watch Whole Workspace | 作用: Whether to watch for the event in the whole workspace, rather than a specific channel | 默认值: False

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.description: The Slack channel to listen to events from. Applies to events: Bot/App mention, File Shared, New Message Posted on Channel, Reaction Added.
channelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel to Watch | 作用: The Slack channel to listen to events from. Applies to events: Bot/App mention, File Shared, New Message Posted on Channel, Reaction Added. | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

downloadFiles.name: downloadFiles
downloadFiles.description: Whether to download the files and add it to the output
downloadFiles.natural_language_description: 参数名: Download Files | 作用: Whether to download the files and add it to the output | 默认值: False

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: resolveIds (值: None) - Whether to resolve the IDs to their respective names and return them
userIds (值: None) - A comma-separated string of encoded user IDs. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
